___ResourceTypeID.description: The SRN of the resource's resource type.

___ResourceHomeRegionID.description: The name of the home [cloud environment] region for this OSDU resource object.

___ResourceObjectCreationDateTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which Version 1 of this OSDU resource object was originated.

___ResourceLifecycleStatus.description: Describes the current Resource Lifecycle status. Possible values - LOADING, RECIEVED, ACCEPTED, RESCINDED, DELETED,

___ResourceCurationStatus.description: Describes the current Curation status. Possible values - CREATED, CURATING, CURATED.

___ResourceSecurityClassification.description: Classifies the security level of the resourcse. Possible values = RESTRICTED, CLASSIFIED, CONFIDENTIAL, MOST-CONFIDENTIAL

___ResourceVersionCreationDateTime.description: Timestamp of the time when the current version of this resource entered the OSDU.

___ResourceHostRegionIDs.description: The name of the host [cloud environment] region(s) for this OSDU resource object.

___ResourceID.description: The SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object at the version level.

___PreLoadFilePath.description: File system path to the data file as it existed before loading to the data platform

___Checksum.description: MD5 checksum of file bytes - a 32 byte hexadecimal number

___FileSource.description: URL or file path for the data in the file
